sentences.en: Aphrodite was worshiped chiefly as the goddess of human love.
sentences.cn: 阿芙罗狄蒂主要是作为人类的爱神而受到膜拜的.

sentences.en: Chiefly, I ask you to remember to write to your elderly mother.
sentences.cn: 首先, 我要你记住给你年老的母亲去信.

sentences.en: He joined the consular service, chiefly because this was one of the few job vacancies.
sentences.cn: 他到领事馆工作，主要因为那是仅有的几个空缺职位之一。

sentences.en: His response to attacks on his work was chiefly bewilderment.
sentences.cn: 听到别人对自己工作的指责，他的反应主要是困惑。

sentences.en: I lived abroad for years, chiefly in Italy.
sentences.cn: 我在国外生活了很多年，主要在意大利。

sentences.en: I wax my boots chiefly to waterproof them.
sentences.cn: 我给靴子打蜡主要是为了防水.

sentences.en: My interest in him chiefly centres in his quick mind.
sentences.cn: 我对他的兴趣主要在于他思路敏捷.

sentences.en: The accident happened chiefly because you were careless.
sentences.cn: 发生事故的主要原因是你不小心.

sentences.en: The colour of these objects was chiefly pale or sombre.
sentences.cn: 这些东西的色彩主要是黯淡,或者说灰暗.

sentences.en: The houses in my hometown were chiefly composed of wood.
sentences.cn: 我家乡的房子过去多由木料制成.

sentences.en: The modifications were aimed chiefly at reducing labour costs and increasing yields.
sentences.cn: 改变的目的主要在于减少劳力成本和增加果实产量.

sentences.en: The work consists chiefly of interviewing the public.
sentences.cn: 这份工作主要是采访公众。

sentences.en: They drew the material of their plays chiefly from myths and legends.
sentences.cn: 他们主要从神话传说中提取剧本的素材.

sentences.en: They were chiefly " balance - of - power'and ascendancy wars.
sentences.cn: 它们主要是 “ 力量对比 ” 、争夺优势的战争.

sentences.en: This evolution has occurred chiefly as a response to increasing labor cost.
sentences.cn: 这种演化主要是随劳力费用增加而引起的.

sentences.en: We are chiefly concerned with improving educational standards.
sentences.cn: 我们主要关心的是提高教育水平。
